verbs.description: [ARG1: The expected historic — and highly surprising — meeting between President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: follows] [ARG2: months of bravado and name - calling between the two volatile leaders] . In the annals of U.S. history , the meeting would surely be one of the most memorable .
